Anyway  I fixed the issue for me, do not know it will help you guys or not. I
did not configure with httpd.conf, i was using standar 8080 port and default
config. now it works after putting httpd.conf

JVM crashes are JVM bugs. We might be doing something to trigger it and hence
may be able to work around it but:
- without exact steps to reproduce we can't do anything
- even if we could reproduce it, generally we prefer to see the root cause fixed
rather than cluttering the Tomcat source with a work-around
 
For now I am going to mark this as invalid. I suggest trying the latest 1.5.0
and following up on the users mailing list or a relevant Java / Solaris list if
you continue to see this issue.
